name: wild dog
dieMessage: a wild @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@dog@c-reset@ lets out a dying howl with its last breath.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ growls viciously and attempts to bite @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ crouches down, bearing his teeth before charging at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ runs around @player-name@ circularly before lunging forward and biting @player-name@'s leg!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ sinks its teeth deeply into @player-name@, sending @player-name@'s @c-red@BLOOD@c-reset@ all over the surrounding grass!

battleMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ jumps high into the air and locks its jaws onto @player-name@'s neck, causing @player-name@ to cry out in agony!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ sniffs around the surrounding area hunting for food and water.
